Trigger.Name: PriorityList (Move this up and down for prio)

Action.Description: DON'T TOUCH THIS, LEAVE AT TOP!

Trigger.Name: Telesto: Monitors/No Monitors(change JSON payload to change marks)

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: {"version": 1, "id": 1, "type": "Bundle", "payload": [ { "id": 2, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk bind1 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:MonitorDebuff[1]})}>" } }, { "id": 3, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk bind2 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:MonitorDebuff[2]})}>" } }, { "id": 4, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk bind3 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:MonitorDebuff[3]})}>" } }, { "id": 5, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack1 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:NoMonitorDebuff[1]})}>" } }, { "id": 6, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack2 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:NoMonitorDebuff[2]})}>" } }, { "id": 7, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack3 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:NoMonitorDebuff[3]})}>" } }, { "id": 8, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack4 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:NoMonitorDebuff[4]})}>" } }, { "id": 9, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack5 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:NoMonitorDebuff[5]})}>" } } ] }
Action.Description: Mark Players (Change JSON payload to change which marks are used)

Trigger.Name: Telesto: MarkerList(change JSON payload to change marks)

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: {"version": 1, "id": 1, "type": "Bundle", "payload": [ { "id": 2, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk ignore1 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:HPSniper[1]})}>" } }, { "id": 3, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk ignore2 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:NoSniperDebuff[1]})}>" } }, { "id": 4, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk bind1 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:HPSniper[2]})}>" } }, { "id": 5, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk bind2 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:NoSniperDebuff[2]})}>" } }, { "id": 6, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack1 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:SniperCannon[1]})}>" } }, { "id": 7, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack2 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:SniperCannon[2]})}>" } }, { "id": 8, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack3 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:SniperCannon[3]})}>" } }, { "id": 9, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack4 <${lvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:SniperCannon[4]})}>" } } ] }
Action.Description: Mark Players (Change JSON payload to change which marks are used)
